content.description: The writer wants to clearly demonstrate the relationship between ideas in the third paragraph. Which version of sentence 8 (reproduced below) most successfully supports this goal?
content.question: Other issues may be more troublesome.

choices.label: Experts from NASA note that technology does, indeed, solve many of the problems.
It is important to do additional research to determine how to keep astronauts healthy during long-term missions.
One experiment, sponsored by the Italian Space Agency (ASI), is measuring brain activity to track and hopefully diminish the harmful effects of space travel.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Use transitional elements to guide the reader through the line of reasoning of an argument.
